posts.post_content:
Rucker EPDG port ****TRADED**** available for trade for an off back I need. Not in the greatest of shape but a cool and tougher combo. If you’re doing offs the portrait only comes in EPDG, Sov and OM with the OM being a pop 1. Needs list below. I can do raw or graded in return. I grade my cards so if raw in return it needs to make sense condition wise. If I need to give a little more because of that cool  Looking for Sov or up. Thanks.

***added a Beck Sov that I can also include
